entry.title: Typora: Extremely Concise Editor
entry.content:
1 Characteristics Intro

1.1 What you see is what you get

  • Only one window.
  • Live Preview â€”â€” Just press "Enter", you will get what you write.

1.2 Convenient to edit table, code and formula â€”â€” block-level element

  • Insert table

    • Keyboard shortcuts: Ctrl + T

    • Examples

  • Insert code

    • Keyboard shortcut: type ``` and then press "Enter"

    • Examples

      def test():
    pass

  • Insert formula

2 Markdown tutorial

2.1 Paragraph

  • Edit your words directly

  • Begin a new line: two spaces + "Enter"
    Examples
    RUNOOB.COM
    GOOGLE.COM

2.2 Fonts

  • Italic Text: *Italic Text*
  • Italic Text: _Italic Text_
  • Bold Text: **Bold Text**
  • Bold Text: __Bold Text__
  • Bold and Italic Text: ***bold and italic text***

2.3 Separator Line

***

* * *

******

- - -

2.4 Delete Line

  • Formation

    ~~AB~~

  • Examples

    AB

2.5 Underline

  • Formation

    <u>text to be underlined</u>

  • Examples
    underlined text

2.6 Foot Notation

Foot Notation is the supplement of text.

  • Formation
    [^text to be noted]

  • Examples
    Create a footnote like this:[1]

2.7 Link

[link name](link address)
This is a link runoob

or

<http://www.runoob.com>
http://www.runoob.com

2.8 Advanced Link

  • Variates can be substituted for links and the variable address is appended to the end of the document.

  • Examples
    Use 1 as the variate for this link: [Google][1]
    Google
    Use 2 as the variate for this link: [Runoob][2]
    Runoob

    At the end of the document, set value(website address) for each variate.
    [1]: http://www.google.com/
    [2]: http://www.runoob.com/

2.9 Pictures

  • Drag and drop directly into the file

  • Formation

    ![alt name](picture address)

    ![alt name](picture address "alternative title")

  • Examples

    ![alt "Picture 1"](C:\Users\JIng\Documents\Typora â€”â€” Extremely Concise editor.assets\nrrrd1.jpg)

    ![alt "Picture 1"](C:\Users\JIng\Documents\Typora â€”â€” Extremely Concise editor.assets\nrrrd1.jpg)

    ![RUNOOB å›¾æ ‡](http://static.runoob.com/images/runoob-logo.png)

    <img src="C:/Users/JIng/Pictures/å£çº¸/670838.jpg" alt="A girl" style="zoom: 25%;" />

2.10 Tables

  • formation

    |  head 1  |  head 2  |
|  ------  |  ------  |
|  table cell  | table cell |
| table cell  | table cell |

    | head 1 | head 2 |
    | ------ | ------ |
    | table cell | table cell |
    | table cell | table cell |

  • Set the alignment of the table

    • -: Set headings and content to right

    • :- Set headings and content to left

    • :-: Set headings and content to the center

    • Examples

      | left alignment | right alignment | center alignment |
| :-----| ----: | :----: |
| table cell | table cell | table cell |
      left alignment right alignment center alignment
      table cell table cell table cell

2.11 Advanced Skills

  • æ”¯æŒçš„ HTML å…ƒç´ 

    ä¸åœ¨ Markdown æ¶µç›–èŒƒå›´ä¹‹å†…çš„æ ‡ç­¾ï¼Œéƒ½å¯ä»¥ç›´æ¥åœ¨æ–‡æ¡£é‡Œé¢ç”¨ HTML æ’°å†™ã€‚

    ç›®å‰æ”¯æŒçš„ HTML å…ƒç´ æœ‰: <b> <kbd> <i> <em> <sup> <sub> <br> ç­‰ ï¼Œå¦‚ï¼š

    ä½¿ç”¨ <kbd>Ctrl</kbd>+<kbd>Alt</kbd>+<kbd>Del</kbd> é‡å¯ç”µè„‘

    ä½¿ç”¨ Ctrl+Alt+Del é‡å¯ç”µè„‘

  • è½¬ä¹‰

    Markdown ä½¿ç”¨äº†å¾ˆå¤šç‰¹æ®Šç¬¦å·æ¥è¡¨ç¤ºç‰¹å®šçš„æ„ä¹‰ï¼Œå¦‚æœéœ€è¦æ˜¾ç¤ºç‰¹å®šçš„ç¬¦å·åˆ™éœ€è¦ä½¿ç”¨è½¬ä¹‰å­—ç¬¦ï¼ŒMarkdown ä½¿ç”¨åæ–œæ è½¬ä¹‰ç‰¹æ®Šå­—ç¬¦ï¼š

    **æ–‡æœ¬åŠ ç²—** 
\*\* æ­£å¸¸æ˜¾ç¤ºæ˜Ÿå· \*\*

    æ–‡æœ¬åŠ ç²—
    ** æ­£å¸¸æ˜¾ç¤ºæ˜Ÿå· **

    Markdown æ”¯æŒä»¥ä¸‹è¿™äº›ç¬¦å·å‰é¢åŠ ä¸Šåæ–œæ æ¥å¸®åŠ©æ’å…¥æ™®é€šçš„ç¬¦å·:

{}  èŠ±æ‹¬å·

  • å…¬å¼

    $$
\mathbf{V}_1 \times \mathbf{V}_2 =  \begin{vmatrix} 
\mathbf{i} & \mathbf{j} & \mathbf{k} \\
\frac{\partial X}{\partial u} &  \frac{\partial Y}{\partial u} & 0 \\
\frac{\partial X}{\partial v} &  \frac{\partial Y}{\partial v} & 0 \\

${$tep1}{\style{visibility:hidden}{(x+1)(x+1)}}
$$

    \mathbf{V}_1 \times \mathbf{V}_2 = \begin{vmatrix} \mathbf{i} & \mathbf{j} & \mathbf{k} \\ \frac{\partial X}{\partial u} & \frac{\partial Y}{\partial u} & 0 \\ \frac{\partial X}{\partial v} & \frac{\partial Y}{\partial v} & 0 \\ \end{vmatrix} ${$tep1}{\style{visibility:hidden}{(x+1)(x+1)}}

2.12 Typora ç”»æµç¨‹å›¾ã€æ—¶åºå›¾(é¡ºåºå›¾)ã€ç”˜ç‰¹å›¾

  • æ¨ªå‘æµç¨‹å›¾æºç æ ¼å¼

entry.title: Hello Gridea
entry.content:
ğŸ‘ æ¬¢è¿ä½¿ç”¨ Gridea ï¼
âœï¸ Gridea ä¸€ä¸ªé™æ€åšå®¢å†™ä½œå®¢æˆ·ç«¯ã€‚ä½ å¯ä»¥ç”¨å®ƒæ¥è®°å½•ä½ çš„ç”Ÿæ´»ã€å¿ƒæƒ…ã€çŸ¥è¯†ã€ç¬”è®°ã€åˆ›æ„... ...

Github
Gridea ä¸»é¡µ
ç¤ºä¾‹ç½‘ç«™
